ThingDef.label: parrot egg (unfert.)
ThingDef.description: An unfertilized parrot egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked.

ThingDef.label: parrot egg (fert.)
ThingDef.description: A fertilized parrot egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a parrot. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.
